name: Twitter - Hide Annoyances
description: I just wanted something simple to clean up the web version a little, this hides all of the sideboxes and other unwanted stuff while keeping the rest of the design as is.

user.name: Ois
user.about: I'm some random Australia guy who people used to know on various forums and IRC.

additional_info:
0.8 - 2016-02-02 @6:06pm - Hides Moments.

0.7 - 2015-12-12 @2:52pm - Hides more 'Who To Follow' stuff.

0.6 - 2015-11-04 @8:28pm - Removes an Ad-Keyword section when searching for words that have ad sponsorship.

0.5 - 2015-07-24 @5:09pm - Attempts to hide "While you were away".  Changes name of style.

0.4 - 2015-05-12 @6:46pm - Blocks the sidebar when viewing an individual tweet+reply page

0.3 - 2014-06-04 @6:06pm - Fixed the profile popup showing as blank.

0.2 - 2014-05-09 @7:05pm - Added in a fix for large zoom levels, or narrow windows.  Sorry, should of caught this in the initial upload.

0.1 - 2014-05-09 @6:46pm - Initial style.
